short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use ChatGPT via Chrome New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the help of ChatGPT All Around extension you will be able to access ChatGPT directly from within your newtab page on google chrome and have the choice to ask whatever you want as long as you are already logged in your ChatGPT account.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the "ChatGPT All Around" tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab to Microsoft Bing provided by the service and the Terms of Use at 
https://chatgptallaround.info/chat/info/TOS 
and Privacy Policy at 
https://chatgptallaround.info/chat/info/privacy
